name: Web Design for Beginners: Real World Coding in HTML & CSS
courseContent: Create any website layout you can imagine
Add tasteful animations and effects with CSS3
Support any device size with Responsive (mobile-friendly) Design
Use common vocabulary from the design industry

name: Modern HTML & CSS From The Beginning (Including Sass)
courseContent: Build Multiple High Quality Website & UI Projects
Flexbox & CSS Grid Projects
Website Hosting & Deployment With FTP & Git
HTML5 Semantic Layout & CSS Fundamentals
CSS Variables, Transitions, Dropdowns, Overlays & More
Website Hosting & Deployment With FTP & Git
All Skill Levels

name: 50 Projects In 50 Days - HTML, CSS & JavaScript
courseContent: Project based teaching to sharpen your HTML, CSS & JavaScript skills
Modern styling with flexbox, CSS animations, custom properties, etc
DOM manipulation, events, array methods, HTTP requests & more

name: Complete React Developer in 2021 (w/ Redux, Hooks, GraphQL)
courseContent: Build enterprise level React applications and deploy to production
Learn the latest features in React including Hooks, Context API, Suspense, React Lazy + more
Become the top 10% ReactJS Developer
Use Redux, Redux Thunk and Redux Saga in your applications
Set up authentication and user accounts
Learn to lead React projects by making good architecture decisions and helping others on your team
Learn CSS in JS with styled-components
Converting apps to Progressive Web Apps
Handling online payments with Stripe API
Learn to build reactive, performant, large scale applications like a senior developer
Routing with React Router
Using the latest ES6/ES7/ES8/ES9/ES10/ES11 JavaScript to write clean code

name: Node with React: Fullstack Web Development
courseContent: Create boilerplate starter projects with React, Redux, Express, and Mongo
Master deployment techniques between the production and development environments
Learn to effectively create and send emails from a backend server
Understand common web technologies and design patterns to connect them together
Make an app with Google OAuth authentication
Accept and process credit card payments from users

name: Object Oriented PHP & MVC
courseContent: Build a custom MVC Framework from absolute scratch
Create a custom PDO class to handle database interactions
Deploy your custom PHP application
Build an application using your custom framework
Complete user authentication using OOP & PDO

name: PHP with Laravel for beginners - Become a Master in Laravel
courseContent: Learn to build applications using laravel
You will learn how use Laravel
You will learn how to create and use Controllers and what they are
You will learn to use the templating engine Blade
How to use Laravel Tinker - Command line program to play around with Laravel without persisting data
Database: Eloquent One to Many - CRUD
Database: Eloquent Polymorphic - CRUD
You will learn to create a BULK functionality that you can use the CRUD on it

name: Android Java Masterclass - Become an App Developer
courseContent: You’re taught step by step HOW to build Android 7 apps for Google’s Nougat platform that will work on older Android versions.
You’ll have EXPERT LEVEL knowledge of the Java programming language and know exactly how each process of Android Nougat development works.
NEW CONTENT is always being added, and you're covered with full lifetime access to the course.
The EXPERTISE to be an Android Nougat app developer as taught by the best.
With each comprehensive step, the WHY you’re doing it is explained.
The course is continually UPDATED, so you’ll learn the very latest as Android Nougat evolves.
SUPPORT is mind blowing – questions you have are answered that day.
The skills you’ll learn are in HIGH DEMAND. You’ve learned to program like an expert. Go get that job!

name: The Complete Java Certification Course
courseContent: How to write Java Programs from scratch and have loads of fun in the process
Go from zero to hero in writing industry ready Java programs
Gain enough experience to pass a core Java Programming interview and perform well on the job
Be prepared to take the Java Certification Exam for OCAJP 1Z0-808

name: Java Programming Masterclass covering Java 11 & Java 17
courseContent: Learn the core Java skills needed to apply for Java developer positions in just 14 hours.
Be able to demonstrate your understanding of Java to future employers.
Acquire essential java basics for transitioning to the Spring Framework, Java EE, Android development and more.
Be able to sit for and pass the Oracle Java Certificate exam if you choose.
Learn industry 'best practices' in Java software development from a professional Java developer who has worked in the language for 18 years.
Obtain proficiency in Java 8 and Java 11.
